name: Blessed Light
story_text: Burning radiance falls upon your foe, transferring some of their energy to a nearby ally.
effect: One ally within distance gains a number of surges equal to the tier outcome of your power roll.

name: Call the Thunder Down
story_text: You ask your saint for thunder and your prayer is answered.
effect: You can push each willing ally in the area the same distance, ignoring stability.

name: Corruption's Curse
story_text: Cursed by you, your enemy takes more damage from your allies.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + I corruption damage; M < WEAK, damage weakness 5 (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 6 + I corruption damage; M < AVERAGE, damage weakness 5 (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 9 + I corruption damage; M < STRONG, damage weakness 5 (save ends)

name: Curse of Terror
story_text: Fear of divine judgment overwhelms your foe.

tier_effects.tier1: 6 + I holy damage; I < WEAK, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 9 + I holy damage; I < AVERAGE, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 13 + I holy damage; I < STRONG, frightened (save ends)

name: Drain
story_text: You drain the energy from your target to revitalize yourself or an ally.
effect: You or one ally within distance can spend a Recovery.

name: Faith Is Our Armor
story_text: The heroes' armor glows with golden light, granting divine protection.
effect: You can target yourself instead of one ally with this ability.

name: Faithful Friend
story_text: An animal spirit is drawn to you, sharing their senses with you and serving you faithfully.
effect: You conjure a spirit that takes the form of any animal you have seen. The incorporeal animal has speed 5 and can fly, but can't physically interact with the world. While you are within 10 squares of the spirit, you automatically sense everything that type of animal would sense, in addition to sensing your own surroundings. You can dismiss the spirit at any time (no action required). If the spirit takes any damage, they are dismissed and you take 1d10 psychic damage that can't be reduced in any way.

name: Font of Wrath
story_text: A brilliant column of holy light appears on the battlefield, striking out at nearby enemies.
effect: You summon a spirit of size 2 who can't be harmed, and who appears in an unoccupied space within distance. The spirit lasts until the end of your next turn. You and your allies can move through the spirit's space, but enemies can't. Any enemy who moves within 2 squares of the spirit for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes holy damage equal to your Intuition score.

name: Grave Speech
story_text: You commune with the lingering soul of the recently dead.
effect: You can speak to the target if they are a creature who has died within the last 24 hours and who can speak a language you know, even if they are just a head. The target regards you as they would have in life, and you might need to make tests to influence them and convince them to speak with you. The trauma of dying can make a creature's memory of that event hazy, but the target otherwise knows all they knew in life. After 1 minute, the effect ends. You can't use this ability on the same creature twice.

name: Hands of the Maker
story_text: You craft objects with the power of your mind.
effect: You create a mundane object of size 1S or smaller. You can maintain a number of objects created this way equal to your Intuition score. You can destroy an object created this way with a thought, no matter how far you are from it (no action required).

name: Healing Grace
story_text: Your divine energy restores the righteous.
effect:
The target can spend a Recovery.

For each piety spent, choose one of the following enhancements:
- You can target one additional ally within distance.
- You can end one effect on a target that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn.
- A prone target can stand up.
- A target can spend 1 additional Recovery.

name: Holy Lash
story_text: A tendril of divine energy shoots forth to draw in your foe.

name: Judgment's Hammer
story_text: Your divine fury is a hammer that crashes down upon the unrighteous.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + I holy damage; A < WEAK, prone
tier_effects.tier2: 6 + I holy damage; A < AVERAGE, prone
tier_effects.tier3: 9 + I holy damage; A < STRONG, prone and can't stand (save ends)

name: Lightfall
story_text: A rain of holy light scours your enemies and repositions your allies.
effect: You can teleport yourself and each ally in the area to unoccupied spaces in the area.

name: Ray of Wrath
story_text: You unleash a blast of holy light upon your foe.
effect: You can have this ability deal holy damage.

name: Sacrificial Offer
story_text: Divine magic tears at your foe and defends a nearby friend.
effect: Choose yourself or one ally within distance. That character can impose a bane on one power roll made against them before the end of their next turn.

name: Sermon of Grace
story_text: You inspire your allies with tales of your saint's great deeds.
effect: Each target can spend a Recovery. Additionally, each target can use a free triggered action to end one effect on them that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn, or to stand up if prone.

name: Staggering Curse
story_text: A blast of judgment disorients your foe.

name: Violence Will Not Aid Thee
story_text: After some holy lightning, your enemy will think twice about their next attack.
effect: The first time on a turn that the target deals damage to another creature, the target of this ability takes 1d10 lightning damage (save ends).

name: Warrior's Prayer
story_text: Your quickly uttered prayer lends aggressive divine energy to a friend engaged in melee.
effect: You or one ally within distance gains temporary Stamina equal to your Intuition score.

name: Wither
story_text: A bolt of holy energy saps the life from a foe.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + I corruption damage; P < WEAK, the target takes a bane on their next power roll
tier_effects.tier2: 5 + I corruption damage; P < AVERAGE, the target takes a bane on their next power roll
tier_effects.tier3: 8 + I corruption damage; P < STRONG, the target takes a bane on their next power roll

name: Word of Guidance
story_text: You invigorate an attacking ally with divine energy.
trigger_text: The target makes an ability roll for a damage-dealing ability.
effect:
The power roll gains an edge.

The power roll has a double edge.

name: Word of Judgment
story_text: Your holy word saps an attacking enemy's strength.
trigger_text: The target would take damage from an ability that uses a power roll.
effect:
The power roll takes a bane against the target.

The power roll has a double bane against the target.

name: Blessing of Fate and Destiny
story_text: Your enemies suffer their fate; your allies embrace their destiny!
effect:
You can target yourself instead of one creature with this ability. Choose one of the following effects, which lasts until the end of the encounter or until you are dying:
- Whenever a target makes a power roll, they can roll three dice and choose which two rolls to use.
- Whenever a target makes a power roll, they must roll three dice and use the lowest two rolls.

name: Blessing of Insight
story_text: The gods grant insight revealing where best to strike your enemies.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, each target gains 1 surge at the end of each of your turns.

name: Divine Comedy
story_text: You and your allies swap places to confound your foes.
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Each target can choose another creature in the area, then swap places with that creature. The creature they choose must be able to fit into the space they leave and vice versa.

name: Morning Light
story_text: Light shines at your command, burning your foes and blessing your allies.
effect: Each ally in the area deals fire damage equal to your Intuition score with their next strike made before the end of their next turn.

name: Nature Judges Thee
story_text: Mystical thorned vines appear at your bidding and bind your foes.

name: Our Hearts Your Strength
story_text: An ally gains strength from their friends.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until the target is dying, at the start of each of the target's turns, they gain a bonus to speed and a bonus to rolled damage equal to the number of allies within 10 squares of them. This bonus lasts until the start of their next turn.

name: Reap
story_text: The gods reward those who smite their foes.
effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time a target kills an enemy, they regain Stamina equal to 5 + your Intuition score.

name: Sacred Bond
story_text: You forge a divine connection between two creatures.
effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever one target takes damage, the other target can use a free triggered action to take the damage instead. The original target suffers any effects associated with the damage. Additionally, whenever one target spends a Recovery, the other target can use a free triggered action to spend a Recovery.

name: Saint’s Tempest
story_text: A raging storm appears, striking your foes with lightning and throwing them around with wind.

name: Statue of Power
story_text: A marble statue of your deity rises from the earth.
effect: A size 2 statue rises out of the ground in an unoccupied space within distance and lasts until the end of the encounter. While within 3 squares of the statue, you gain 1 surge at the start of each of your turns. Each ally within 3 squares of the statue gains this same benefit. The statue is destroyed if it takes 20 or more damage. It has immunity all to poison and psychic damage.

name: The Gods Command You Obey
story_text: You speak with the voice of your saint, commanding your enemies.

tier_effects.tier1: 4 + I holy damage; P < WEAK, before taking damage, the target makes a free strike against a target you choose
tier_effects.tier2: 7 + I holy damage; P < AVERAGE, before taking damage, the target uses an ability of your choice and you choose any targets for that ability
tier_effects.tier3: 11 + I holy damage; P < STRONG, before taking damage, the target shifts up to their speed to a location you choose, uses an ability of your choice, and you choose any targets for that ability

name: Wellspring of Grace
story_text: A holy light is emitted from your body, healing your allies.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, whenever a target starts their turn in the area, they can spend a Recovery.

name: Fear of the Gods
story_text: Your divine magic makes a creature appear as what your enemies fear most.

tier_effects.tier1: 6 psychic damage; I < WEAK, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 9 psychic damage; I < AVERAGE, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 13 psychic damage; I < STRONG, frightened (save ends)

effect: Each target is frightened of you or a creature you choose within distance.

name: Saint's Raiment
story_text: An ally becomes the wearer of an empowered golden cloak.
effect: The target gains 20 temporary Stamina and 3 surges.

name: Soul Siphon
story_text: A beam of energy connects a foe to a friend, draining life from one to heal the other.
effect: One ally within distance can spend any number of Recoveries.

name: Words of Wrath and Grace
story_text: Your saint grants your enemies a vision of pain and fills your allies with healing energy.
effect: Each ally in the area can spend a Recovery.

name: Beacon of Grace
story_text: You ignite a foe with holy radiance, rewarding allies who attack them.
effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or any ally damages the target using an ability, that creature can spend a Recovery. If the target is reduced to 0 Stamina before the end of the encounter, you can use a free triggered action to move this effect to another creature within distance.

name: Blessing of Secrets
story_text: You project an illusory aura that makes you and allies harder to notice.
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Each creature in the area has a double edge on tests made to hide or sneak. The aura lasts until you end it (no action required) or until a target harms or deals damage to a creature or object.

name: Penance
story_text: "If you won't kneel, the gods will make you."

tier_effects.tier1: 4 corruption damage; I < WEAK, prone and can't stand (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 7 corruption damage; I < AVERAGE, prone and can't stand (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 11 corruption damage; I < STRONG, prone and can't stand (save ends)

name: Sanctuary
story_text: You send yourself or an ally to a divine manifold to instantaneously regain health.
effect: The target is removed from the encounter map until the start of their next turn and can spend any number of Recoveries. At the start of their turn, the target reappears in the space they left or the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

name: Vessel of Retribution
story_text: You infuse yourself or an ally with the retributive energy of the gods, waiting to be unleashed.
effect: The first time the target is dying or winded before the end of the encounter, each enemy within 5 squares of them takes 15 holy damage.

name: Beacon of Grace
story_text: You ignite a foe with holy radiance, rewarding allies who attack them.
effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or any ally damages the target using an ability, that creature can spend a Recovery. If the target is reduced to 0 Stamina before the end of the encounter, you can use a free triggered action to move this effect to another creature within distance.

tier_effects.tier2: 7 corruption damage; I < AVERAGE, prone and can't stand (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 11 corruption damage; I < STRONG, prone and can't stand (save ends)

story_text: You infuse yourself or an ally with the retributive energy of the gods, waiting to be unleashed.
effect: The first time the target is dying or winded before the end of the encounter, each enemy within 5 squares of them takes 15 holy damage.

name: Aura of Souls
story_text: A whirlwind of souls of the dead flies around you at your command.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, at the end of each of your turns, you can slide each creature in the area up to a number of squares equal to your Intuition score. This forced movement ignores stability for your allies.

name: Blade of the Heavens
story_text: A greatsword streams down from the sky, threatening to pin your foe.

tier_effects.tier1: 8 + I damage; A < WEAK, prone and restrained (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 12 + I damage; A < AVERAGE, prone and restrained (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 16 + I damage; A < STRONG, prone and restrained (save ends)

name: Blessing of the Midday Sun
story_text: Your body emits a heat that bakes your enemies and inspires your allies.
targets: Self and each creature in the area
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, each enemy in the area takes a bane on power rolls, and you and each ally in the area gain 1 surge at the end of each of your turns.

name: Cuirass of the Gods
story_text: Your allies are covered in spiritual armor.
effect: You can target yourself instead of one creature with this ability. Each target has damage immunity 5 until the start of your next turn.

name: Gods’ Machine
story_text: You conjure a whirring tank made of blades and metal.
effect:
You conjure a size 2 rolling machine that appears in an unoccupied space within distance. The machine has 50 Stamina and immunity all to poison and psychic damage. It disappears at the end of the encounter, if its Stamina drops to 0, or if you are dying. When the machine first appears, make the following power roll once, targeting each enemy adjacent to it.

Once on each subsequent turn, you can use a free maneuver to move the machine a number of squares up to your Intuition score then repeat the power roll.

name: Invocation of Mystery
story_text: "Now you see us..."
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Each target is invisible until the start of your next turn.

name: Invocation of Undoing
story_text: You utter a secret word of destruction known only to deities.
effect: You can choose to have this ability deal damage to and push objects, and to deal damage to buildings.

name: Lauded by God
story_text: You beseech the gods to give your allies what they need to win the day, and the gods answer.
effect: Each target gains 3 of their Heroic Resource.

name: Lightning Lord
story_text: Lightning bursts forth from your body in several directions.
effect: The targets are force moved one at a time, starting with the target nearest to you, and can be pushed into other targets in the same line.

name: Revitalizing Grace
story_text: With a gesture, you restore your health and that of your allies.
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Each target can spend any number of Recoveries. Additionally, each target can end one effect on themself that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn, or they can stand up if prone.

name: Spirit Stampede
story_text: Animal spirits run through the battlefield, trampling your foes.

tier_effects.tier1: 5 damage; M < WEAK, prone and can't stand (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 8 damage; M < AVERAGE, prone and can't stand (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 11 damage; M < STRONG, prone and can't stand (save ends)

name: Your Story Ends Here
story_text: You bend the fate of a foe, willing them to die.

tier_effects.tier1: 9 + I corruption damage; R < WEAK, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 14 + I corruption damage; R < AVERAGE, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 19 + I corruption damage; R < STRONG, weakened (save ends)

effect: If this damage kills the target, you and each ally within distance can spend a Recovery.

name: Arise!
story_text: Your deity rewards you or an ally on the verge of defeat with a miracle burst of strength and resolve.
effect: The target can spend any number of Recoveries, can end any effects on them that are ended by a saving throw or that end at the end of their turn, and can stand up if they are prone. Additionally, at the start of each of their turns until the end of the encounter or until they are dying, the target gains 3 surges.

name: Blessing of Steel
story_text: A protective aura defends your allies from harm.
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Until the end of the encounter, any ability roll made against a target takes a bane and each target has damage immunity 5.

name: Blessing of the Blade
story_text: "The power of the gods is within you, friends. Allow me to unleash it."
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: At the end of each of your turns until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, each target gains 3 surges.

name: Drag the Unworthy
story_text: You conjure an angel who moves a foe and heals your allies.
effect: Each ally the target comes adjacent to during the forced movement can spend a Recovery.

name: Guided to Your Side
story_text: You concentrate on a friend and teleport to them.
effect: Each target is teleported to unoccupied spaces within 5 squares of a willing creature who you are bonded to with your Invocation of the Heart feature. You don't need line of effect to the bonded creature but you must be on the same world.

name: Trinity of Trickery
story_text: Hey! I'm over here. No, here, numbskull.
effect: You create two illusory duplicates of the target, which appear anywhere within distance. These duplicates last until the end of the encounter. On each of their turns, the target can move each duplicate up to their speed. If the target is targeted by an ability, they can use a free triggered action to switch places with a duplicate within their line of effect, making the duplicate the target of the ability instead. When either duplicate takes damage, it is destroyed.

name: Arise!
story_text: Your deity rewards you or an ally on the verge of defeat with a miracle burst of strength and resolve.
effect: The target can spend any number of Recoveries, can end any effects on them that are ended by a saving throw or that end at the end of their turn, and can stand up if they are prone. Additionally, at the start of each of their turns until the end of the encounter or until they are dying, the target gains 3 surges.

name: Blessing of Steel
story_text: A protective aura defends your allies from harm.
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Until the end of the encounter, any ability roll made against a target takes a bane and each target has damage immunity 5.

name: Blessing of the Blade
story_text: "The power of the gods is within you, friends. Allow me to unleash it."
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: At the end of each of your turns until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, each target gains 3 surges.

name: Drag the Unworthy
story_text: You conjure an angel who moves a foe and heals your allies.
effect: Each ally the target comes adjacent to during the forced movement can spend a Recovery.

name: Alacrity of the Heart
story_text: You speak inspiring words to a friend and spur them to incredible feats.
effect: The target has an additional main action they can use on their next turn, and gains 3 of their Heroic Resource.

name: Bend Fate
story_text: The gods know you must prevail, and they bless your fate.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, each of the target's power rolls has its outcome improved by one tier.

name: Blessing of the Fortress
story_text: A magic circle extends out from you, barring foes from getting close.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, no enemy can approach within 5 squares of you by moving or by being force moved by any enemy. Targets can be force moved closer to you by you or your allies, or can move closer because of your movement.

name: Divine Dragon
story_text: From nothing but divine will, you create a powerful ally.
effect:
You conjure a size 4 dragon that appears in an unoccupied space within distance. The dragon has speed 6 and can fly, stability 4, 100 Stamina, immunity all to fire damage, and uses your characteristics. The dragon disappears at the end of the encounter, if their Stamina drops to 0, or if you are dying.
On subsequent turns, you can use a main action to command the dragon to breathe magic fire in a 3 cube within 1 square of them. Make the following power roll targeting each enemy in the area.

Additionally, you can use a maneuver to move the dragon up to their speed, or to make a melee weapon strike with their claw against an adjacent creature or object. The dragon can also make this strike as a free strike.

name: Godstorm
story_text: You summon a divine storm that remains under your control.
effect: A raging storm fills the area until the end of the encounter or until you are dying. At the start of each of your turns, you can move the storm up to 5 squares (no action required). On subsequent turns while the storm is active, you can use a maneuver to make its power roll.

name: Night Falls
story_text: You summon darkness that thwarts only your foes.
effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, the area is filled with magic darkness that your enemies can't see through, but you and your allies can.

name: Radiance of Grace
story_text: Intense light is emitted from your body, healing your allies.
effect: You can target yourself instead of one ally with this ability. Each target can spend any number of Recoveries, can end any effects on them that are ended by a saving throw or that end at the end of their turn, and can stand up if they are prone.

name: Righteous Phalanx
story_text: A wall of spinning swords and knives appears where you wish.
effect: The wall lasts until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, and can be placed in occupied squares. Creatures can enter and pass through the wall. Each enemy who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes 15 damage.

name: Solar Flare
story_text: You call down a sphere of fire that burns your foes to ash.

name: Thorn Cage
story_text: Vines burst forth from the ground and bind your foe, slowly closing around them.

tier_effects.tier1: 10 + I damage; A < WEAK, restrained (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 15 + I damage; A < AVERAGE, restrained (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 21 + I damage; A < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

effect: While restrained this way, the target takes 10 damage at the start of each of your turns.

name: Word of Final Redemption
story_text: Your death will fuel our victory.
effect: Before the target dies, you can look at their stat block and force them to use one ability that is a main action or a maneuver. If the ability costs a Heroic Resource or Malice, the creature can use it without any cost. For the purpose of using this ability, your allies and enemies are the target's allies and enemies, and you decide who the ability targets.

name: Word of Weakening
story_text: You utter a divine word that makes a foe brittle.

tier_effects.tier1: 10 + I corruption damage; A < WEAK, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 15 + I corruption damage; A < AVERAGE, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 21 + I corruption damage; A < STRONG, weakened (save ends)

effect: While weakened this way, the target has damage weakness 10.
